Articles.Content:
Hello everyone from Italy! 

I've been playing KSP since last summer, such a great game, learned a lot about physics, space, and how to try-not-to-kill-Kerbs (thanks Scott Manley for that).
Still in I forgot parachutes phase tho

Ciao redzep, benvenuto sul forum! Spero ti troverai bene nella comunità, qui toverai aiuto per qualsiasi tua esigenza.

Hi redzep, welcome to the forum! Hope you'll be fine with the community here, it will help you in whatever question you may bring.

We all are at that stage mate, you never leave it. Welcome to the forums!

Fire
